Title: Thrift Store Clerk - Winnipeg, MB - Indeed.com
Description:
Provide service to customers and clients, sort and price incoming merchandise and assist management in store operations as required. Contribute to meeting store sales, budgets and maintaining good customer relationships, ensuring stock is rotated in a timely manner.
PRIMARY JOB FUNCTIONS
Greet and serve customers/donors in a friendly and professional matter, both on the sales floor and on phones
Assist in keeping store tidy, clean, organized and stocked with merchandise
Some cashier duties (including occasional deposits) as required: ensuring transactions are accurate and
procedures followed
Unload front donation bin to backroom, sorting and organizing in accordance with store procedure
Prepare and price merchandise for sale in accordance with store procedure, meeting daily production goals
Some light housekeeping duties as required
QUALIFICATIONS
Valid driver’s license and own transportation
Friendly and polite demeanour
Works well with others
Honest and trustworthy
Willingness to adhere to Adult & Teen Challenge policies and procedures

Weekends

Title: Cashier/Garnisher - Calgary, AB - Indeed.com

Overview
MAKE YOUR CAREER A BEAUTIFUL THING AT OUR SPLIT HARVEY’S & SWISS LOCATION IN SIGNAL HILL
For over 60 years, we have been serving great tasting, flame-grilled burgers to Canadians. We are on a journey and are always looking for great people to be part of this iconic 100% Canadian brand that has homegrown roots across the country.
Owning the engine room and operating the Grill and Fryer will be your motivation. Cooking flame-grilled Burgers and frying golden crisp fries and onion rings in a clean, food safe environment will be your focus. Title: Head Cashier - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
PASSION FOR FASHION?
Take the first step towards an exciting future.
At the ALDO Group, we are looking for talented people to join our sales team.
We offer rewarding challenges in a fast-paced and creative environment as well as competitive salaries, discounts on merchandise, incentive programs and much more!
If you are dynamic, ambitious and interested in being a part of the exciting world of fashion, why not apply? Bring your resume and apply within store at our TORONTO EATON CENTRE (LEVEL 2) location.
ABOUT THE ALDO GROUP
Created in 1972, with its head office in Montreal, Canada, the ALDO Group is a company with roots based on compassion and ethics. We started off as, and continue to be, a company that aims to influence society in both fashion and social responsibility.
Today, we oversee thousands of boutiques in countries across the world. We cover all corners of the footwear market and are proudly represented by ALDO/ALDO Accessories, Call It Spring/Spring, and GLOBO.
OUR TEAM
We’re known for our passionate, productive and motivated workforce. That’s because we’re a company that’s committed first and foremost to our people. We provide the best tools and training to inspire a healthy work ethic and overall excellence. At our core, we believe that when one person grows, so does the company.
Job Overview and Responsibilities
This is an exciting career opportunity for a dynamic and ambitious individual who thrives within a fast-paced, fun and rewarding environment. The ideal candidate is a business-minded trendsetter who understands today's ever-changing fashion landscape. Excellent communication and leadership skills are key.
- Operate the POS cash efficiently
- Effectuates store transactions
- Performing administrative tasks efficiently
- Verifying merchandise to avoid mismatches
- Supporting the store management in developing customer base
- Suggestive selling to meet customer needs
- Providing total customer service
- Managing inventory and loss prevention
- Controlling operating costs
- String ability to adapt to different cultures and environments
Job Requirements
- Experience in cash handling or administration (minimum 1 year)
- Strong leadership and team building skills
- Excellent communication skills
- Must be available to work weekends and flexible shifts throughout week days
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Permanent
Benefits:
Employee assistance program
Store discount
Schedule:
10 hour shift
8 hour shift
Day shift
Holidays
Night shift
Weekend availability
Work remotely:
No

Title: Seasonal Cashier - Hamilton, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
R. Denninger Limited is one of the finest food companies in the world. For more than 60 years, quality has been the founding criteria of our company. Denninger’s has five retail locations, a manufacturing plant and a warehouse all located throughout Southern Ontario. Denninger’s associates are hand picked to provide the best service in the industry. If you have a passion for customer service and thrive in a team environment, Denninger’s is the place for you!
We offer a rewarding and fun work atmosphere with flexible work schedules, competitive salary options and all associates receive a 20% discount on our product. We provide training focused on practical skills and teamwork, along with opportunities for career advancement.
Job Summary:
The Cashier is responsible for customer service at the checkout in a friendly, courteous and efficient manner.
Reports to:
Cash Department Head
Employment Type:
Seasonal/Temporary Contract Full-time - Now to December.
Job Duties
- Scan items into the Point of Sale scanner to determine how much a customer owes Denninger’s for their purchase.
- Collect payment for the customer purchase.
- Ensures that customers are processed through the checkout in a friendly, courteous and efficient manner.
- Informs Department Head of all items that are not scanning properly.
- Ensures that the checkout area is kept clean and stocked at all times.
- Bags and boxes groceries or Bistro items.
- May perform pickups or day end cash balancing as required.
- General housekeeping (sweeping, mopping, restroom maintenance).
- May assist with Curbside orders.
- All other duties as directed by Store Management.
Requirements
- Ability to communicate effectively with customers, staff and other departments within the organization.
- Strong customer service skills are required.
- Basic math skills are required.
- Ability to work independently and as a part of a team.
- Available for flexible scheduling to meet the needs of the store.
- Ability to work under pressure.
Essential Job Functions
- Standing and walking for extended periods of time.
- Bend and stoop to grasp objects and climb ladders.
- Bend and twist the upper body, reach above and below shoulders.
- Bend and lift loads, up to a maximum of 50 pounds.
- Push and pull carts weighing up to 100 pounds.
- Repetitive use of hands for grasping, pushing, pulling and fine manipulation.
We thank all applicants, however, only those being considered for an interview will be contacted.
R. Denninger Limited is an equal opportunity employer and we value the importance of diversity and dignity in the workplace. If you are contacted by R. Denninger Limited regarding a job opportunity, please advise prior to the interview if you require accommodation and we will work with you to make appropriate arrangements.
Job Type: Full-time

Title: Cashier – Full-time, Daytime Hours - Ralph, SK - Indeed.com
Description:
in Ralph's
Our business is all about awesome food, and we need someone to help us sell copious amounts of it to the people we love – our customers. We are seeking a full-time, daytime (must be available anytime between the hours of 7:30 am to 6:30 pm).
What you’ll be doing:
As a Cashier, you’ll follow the direction of Frances, our Front-End Manager & Joseph our Store Manager and delivering the best possible experience to our customers, every day and making Ralph’s/Meridian a happy place for all who visit.
Requirements for crushing it:
You have experience in customer service and cash handling in a retail setting.
You’re a genuinely happy and outgoing people person, and you get a buzz off making someone’s day.
You’re efficient, you like to GSD (Get Stuff Done) and you know how to hustle.
You roll up your sleeves and roll with the punches when things go sideways.
You’re self-motivated and care about making an impact.
You want to learn and welcome new stretching challenges and opportunities.
You’re able to work on your feet all day, bending, leaning, crouching, and walking.
You’re available to daytime hours (not suitable for high school students) work weekends, some evenings, and holidays.
Why work at Ralph’s/Meridian?
We’ve got an upbeat company culture and team of friends (a family, a squad) who know the best way to get work done is to have fun doing it. Compensation for this position includes:
Starting at $15.20/hr
Store discount
Advancement Opportunities Available
